place_of_publication.publication_title: Bull. Natl. Sci. Mus., Tokyo, n.s.,

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 短苞薹草 duan bao tai cao

treatment.description: Involucral bracts shorter than inflorescence. Female glumes ± equaling utricle. Fl. and fr. May–Jun.
treatment.distribution: ● Rock crevices along streamsides, moist places; ca. 1500 m. Jiangxi, Sichuan.
